high_descs: Move slightly right then turn left to face back toward the right side of the dark sofa
Pick up the laptop from the sofa
Turn left and walk to the floor lamp in the corner left of the sofa
anns.task_desc: Look at the laptop under the light from the floor lamp

high_descs: move to the right a bit and face the couch you were originally facing
close the laptop and pick it up off of the couch
turn left, walk forwards and turn to face the lamp on the right
turn on the lamp in front of you
anns.task_desc: turn on a lamp while holding a laptop

high_descs: Pick up the computer from the couch.
Bring the computer to the lamp in the corner
anns.task_desc: Examine the computer by the light of the lamp.
